content: this listing is for the ad-free pdf pattern for billy the buck only - not a finished product a free version of the pattern is available on my website andshelaughsblog com this fun and simple pattern is quick to work up and finishes a deer mount fitting on a 7 x9 wood plaque a great pattern for beginner or intermediate amigurumi artists you will need to know basic crochet stitches including magic_ring - mc slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet chain - chain single_crochet increase - increase invisible decrease - inv decrease materials needed d hook 3 25mm worsted weight yarn colours needed tan cream black very little 2 safety eyes 12mm 7 x 9 wood plaque small self-leveling hanger hot glue fiberfil yarn needle stitch marker scissors optional paint or wood stain feel free to contact me if you have any questions or problems with this pattern
